Using their [[Absorbing Eye|cybernetic eye]] implants, the user shoots a destruction beam of chakra. The beams are strong enough to prevent the target from using any regenerative or healing abilities to heal the damaged area by completely obliterating the cells. The usage consumes a large amount of chakra.
